title: How to burn a DVD to a blank DVD on a laptop - Quora

response.answer_text: Download and install Leawo DVD Creator on your computer. Then follow the below steps to learn how to convert MP4 to DVD on PC (The Mac version shares the same MP4 to DVD burning steps): Step 1: Launch Leawo MP4 to DVD converter. Click “Add Video” button, or directly drag and drop source MP4 files into this MP4 to DVD burner. Step 2: If you need, select a disc menu template from the right sidebar and then click the middle of it to get instant preview. You could even dit disc menu by changing background music/photo, title, text font, etc. Step 3: Click the big green "Burn" button to call out the setting sidebar, where you need to set Burn to (Multiple choices allowed), Disc Labela and Save to options. To burn MP4 to DVD disc, select disc drive as target under Burn to. The Burn to option allows multiple choices. Step 4: Finally, click the bottom "Burn" button on the sidebar panel to start burning MP4 to DVD on Windows.
You need a CD/DVD Drive and a burning program. The most well known one would be the Nero Burning ROM.
